programme.title: On Y2K Alert
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke discusses the US Government’s precautions against the millennium bug.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke discusses the precautions being taken by the US government to minimise the potential damage to the banking and administration services from the millennium bug.
